```

comments.body: Hi there @dandavison ! Do you know if this is being prioritized?
Let's do https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-python/issues/625 and https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-python/issues/795 at the same time

title: [Bug] Pyright (strict mode) fails on `start`/`execute` activity/workflow calls
